                                                 java.lang.String sessionId)
                                          throws org.olap4j.OlapException
Description copied from interface: DiscoveryService
Retreives a list of available cubes for the current connection. One must first create a connection via the Session service.

Specified by:

getDimensions

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDimensions(java.lang.String userId,
                                                      java.lang.String sessionId,
                                                      org.olap4j.Axis.Standard axis)
                                               throws org.olap4j.OlapException
Description copied from interface: DiscoveryService
Retreives a list of dimensions currently placed on a given dimension. For dimensions not currently used, pass a null value as the Axis parameter.

Specified by:
getDimensions in interface DiscoveryService
Parameters:
userId - The id of the user who requests this operation.
sessionId - The id of the current session into which to perform this operation.
axis - The axis for which we want the current dimensions.
Returns:
A list of dimension names.
Throws:
org.olap4j.OlapException - If something goes sour.

getMembers

public StringTree getMembers(java.lang.String userId,
                             java.lang.String sessionId,
                             java.lang.String dimensionName)
                      throws org.olap4j.OlapException
Description copied from interface: DiscoveryService
Returns a tree representation of the members included in a given dimension. The representation only includes their names.

Specified by:
getMembers in interface DiscoveryService
Parameters:
userId - The id of the user who requests this operation.
sessionId - The id of the current session into which to perform this operation.
dimensionName - The name of which we want the tree of members.
Returns:
A StringTree representation of the members included in a dimension.
Throws:
org.olap4j.OlapException - If anything goes sour.
